Name: Kick Ball
About the game: Kick Ball is a puzzle style game featuring football. This game aims to hit the goal, choosing the angle and strength of the ball that the player can in different ways reach the goal. Having to go through bombs, thorns, saws and others... will be a big challenge. - There will be 60 increasingly difficult phases - 3 different maps - Shops with multiple balls to choose from
